name: MultiTran.ru - Clean App Interface [Ath]
description:
Clean application-like design.

  • Configurable fonts and colors.
  • Sans-serif font with bigger font size by default.
  • Clean text links.
  • Soft gradients and box shadows.
  • Centered main content.
  • 4-column phrases list (limited browser support).
  • No ads.
additional_info:
1.1
• 4-column phrases list (requires supports for display:grid and display:contents, currently only Firefox)
1.0.1
• Fixed dependency on case of m.exe
• Removed Flash embed
1.0
• Release
